extracted_text: 11/18/25, 12:12 PM Investor Flex DSCR 30 Year Fixed Blue Matrix Updated April 9, 2025 Investor Flex DSCR 30 Year Fixed Blue Matrix Updated April 9, 2025 Applicable to all loans imported on or after April 9, 2025 Investment Only Feedback PURCHASE & RATE AND TERM REFINANCE Units Max Loan Size DSCR Max LTV/CLTV/HCLTV Min FICO1 Min Months of Reserves 80% 700 ≥ 1.00 $3,000,000 75% 680 1-4 Unit 3 ≥ 1.20 70% 660 $1,500,000 ≥ 0.80 70% 680 1FICO <=660 not permitted in Massachusetts or Nevada https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/secondary/newinvestorflexdscr30yearfixedbluematrix/#<AnchorA>#<AnchorA> 1/3 11/18/25, 12:12 PM Investor Flex DSCR 30 Year Fixed Blue Matrix Updated April 9, 2025 CASH-OUT REFINANCE Units Max Loan Size DSCR Max LTV/CLTV/HCLTV Min FICO1 Min Months of Reserves 75% 700 1-4 Unit $2,500,000 ≥ 1.00 3 70% 680 1FICO <=660 not permitted in Massachusetts or Nevada BASIC PRODUCT PARAMETERS Feedback Minimum loan amount No appraisal waivers Cash out proceeds can Cash Out proceeds limited to $500,000 $50,000 allowed be used as reserves First time homebuyers not Loan must be deemed a business purpose Manufactured Homes not permitted permitted loan and be exempt from the ATR and QM Temporary buydowns Prepayment Penalties: Prepayment Penalties by state See Escrow Waiver Policy for eligibility and not permitted 3/2/1; 2/1; 1/1 as permissible by law state criteria https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/secondary/newinvestorflexdscr30yearfixedbluematrix/#<AnchorA>#<AnchorA> 2/3 11/18/25, 12:12 PM Investor Flex DSCR 30 Year Fixed Blue Matrix Updated April 9, 2025 STATE REQUIREMENTS Not permitted in West Virginia **Please refer to the current Investor Flex Guidelines for detailed underwriting guidelines, reserves, and documentation requirements. All borrowers on the loan must have a FICO score and must meet the FICO requirement. ** DATE UPDATED: 4/9/2025 PROPRIETARY AND CONFIDENTIAL TO UWM - FOR USE BY UWM APPROVED PARTIES ONLY.
